about: Hello, I am Yakupha Ntonintshi.I was born and raised in a small township called Khayelitsha in Cape Town. I live with both my parents and my two brothers. I am the only girl at home. My passion for web developer started when I applied at Life Choices. I only had an IT background, where I was doing one programming language which was Delphi, which also added an impact in me loving everything about coding. I was awarded a certification of a peer supporter in High school, where I was supporting my peers emotionally and mentally.

skills.title: Javascript
skills.hover: A versatile programming language primarily used for adding interactivity and dynamic behavior to websites.

skills.title: HTML
skills.hover: HyperText Markup Language is the standard markup language used to create and design documents on the web.

skills.title: CSS
skills.hover: Cascading Style Sheets is a stylesheet language used to control the presentation and layout of HTML elements on a web page.

skills.title: Delphi
skills.hover: An integrated development environment (IDE) and programming language used primarily for developing Windows applications.

skills.title: Excel
skills.hover: A powerful spreadsheet application developed by Microsoft, widely used for data organization, analysis, and visualization.

skills.title: NODE
skills.hover: A popular open-source runtime environment that allows developers to execute JavaScript code on the server side.

testimonials.name: Lamlankosi Nomnganga
testimonials.review: We were blown away by the quality of Yakupha's work. She created a website that is visually stunning, highly functional, and perfectly aligned with our brand. Her attention to detail and commitment to excellence is apparent in every aspect of her work. Yakupha is a true professional who cares deeply about their clients' success. We couldn't be happier with our new site.

testimonials.name: Khanya Pupuma
testimonials.review: From the start, Yakupha stood out for her creativity, technical proficiency, and dedication to client satisfaction. She took our ideas and turned them into a dynamic website that has significantly enhanced our online presence.

testimonials.name: Simanye Somdaka
testimonials.review: As an aspiring developer Yakupha portrays extraordinary skills in her projects which express elegancy. I am always delighted to work with her.

testimonials.name: Awodwa Hendrick
testimonials.review: Working with Yakupha has been a game-changer for our project. Her ability to understand our vision and translate it into a functional, beautiful website was nothing short of impressive. She was responsive, professional, and incredibly detail-oriented. Our website not only looks fantastic but also performs seamlessly.

testimonials.name: Nusaibah Abderemane Charif
testimonials.review: Working with Yakupha has honestly been a wonderful experience. She brings an innovative and creative approach to the development process.

testimonials.name: Erin William
testimonials.review: Although I've only recently become acquainted with Yakupha, her kindness and work ethic speak volumes about her character. It's evident that she approaches everything with genuine warmth and determination. Yakupha's commitment to her tasks is admirable, and her considerate nature shines through in every interaction.

projects.description: I built this calculator using mostly javascript as it needed more functionality, then I used CSS for styling it. HTML is used as a template to display the calculator.
I built this keyboard using mostly Javascript for functioning, CSS for styling and HTML. It adds your to do list and you can delete a certain task when you are done doing it
I had a NODE project, which was a partner project, whereby we did e-commerce selling jewellery. It consists of Javascript for functioning, CSS for styling and HTML as a template.
I created this BMI Calculator to keep track of my health. I used Javascript, CSS and HTML. It tells you when you are underweight, overweight or in a good weight, based on your results.
I made this temparature converter. It converts the kelvin temperature to celsius temparature. It can even help you to know the kelvin temparature in celcius temp.
I created this flip card using HTML, CSS and Javascript. It flips another card when hovering a card. It is a nice animation to do and to know. It is a nice feature to have in a project
